answerText: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe[10] This other German poet wrote "Die Lorelei" as well as a work about the title dancing bear in Atta Troll.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 10 | 21 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This author wrote two "Wanderer's Nightsongs" as well as a poem about a father and son who ride in the night while the title figure whispers to the son. For 10 points each: [10] Name this author of "Der Erlkonig" who is perhaps better known for writing about the title character's love for Lotte in The Sorrows of Young Werther.
